New Records: Mark Vientos became the youngest player in National League history to have three extra-base hits in a postseason game.
Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a walk-off single in the bottom of the ninth inning.
Mark Vientos hit two home runs and a double.
Brandon Nimmo hit a go-ahead home run in the top of the seventh inning.
Pete Alonso hit an opposite-field home run in the sixth inning.
Luis Severino gave up three consecutive hits to tie the game in the sixth inning.
Bryson Stott hit a triple in the eighth inning to put the Phillies ahead.
Mark Vientos hit a two-run home run in the ninth inning to tie the game.
